titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller Family and Associates (Room 5600), Contributions FA1857

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:29:22 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Cards are arranged alphabetically by institutional name.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection of contribution cards documents generations of philanthropic institutional giving by members of the Rockefeller family from 1941 through 1987, including but not limited to donations given by John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby Rockefeller Mauze, Blanchette Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, Happy Rockefeller, John D. Rockefeller 3rd, Laurance S. Rockefeller, Martha Baird Rockefeller, Mary French Rockefeller, Mary Todhunter Clark Rockefeller, Nelson A. Rockefeller, Peggy Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, as well as members of the "Cousins generation", and others.

The contribution cards were created and maintained by Rockefeller family office (Room 5600) staff. Each card provides the institutional name, the initials of the donating Rockefeller family member, the date/year, and associated remarks. Entries are handwritten. Some entries provide the amount of the pledge, others simply document that a contribution was made without specifying the amount given. Cards are often two-sided, with pledges documented on both sides.

Gifts to an institution are initially documented with one card per institution. Additional cards are added when multiple donations have filled the first card, with long-term or even generational giving to an institution represented by multiple cards.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection was donated to the Rockefeller Archive Center in accordance with the terms of the David Rockefeller estate. RAC has title, copyright, and literary rights in so far as it holds them.
